colour.LOG_DECODING_CURVES¶

colour.LOG_DECODING_CURVES = CaseInsensitiveMapping({'ACEScc': ..., 'ACEScct': ..., 'Log3G12': ..., 'Log3G10': ..., 'ACESproxy': ..., 'Canon Log': ..., 'REDLogFilm': ..., 'S-Log3': ..., 'S-Log': ..., 'Cineon': ..., 'Panalog': ..., 'ERIMM RGB': ..., 'PLog': ..., 'ViperLog': ..., 'Protune': ..., 'ALEXA Log C': ..., 'S-Log2': ..., 'REDLog': ..., 'V-Log': ..., 'Canon Log 2': ..., 'Canon Log 3': ...})¶

Supported log decoding curves.

LOG_DECODING_CURVES : CaseInsensitiveMapping
{‘ACEScc’, ‘ACEScct’, ‘ACESproxy’, ‘ALEXA Log C’, ‘Canon Log 2’, ‘Canon Log 3’, ‘Canon Log’, ‘Cineon’, ‘ERIMM RGB’, ‘Log3G10’, ‘Log3G12’, ‘Panalog’, ‘PLog’, ‘Protune’, ‘REDLog’, ‘REDLogFilm’, ‘S-Log’, ‘S-Log2’, ‘S-Log3’, ‘V-Log’, ‘ViperLog’}
